Name: GLOBAL:SOFAConventions
Comment: This conventions stores IRs for general purposes, i.e., only the SOFA general metadata are predefined.

Name: GLOBAL:DataType
Comment: We use FIR datatype which in addition depends on Emitters (E).

Name: GLOBAL:License
Default: No license provided, ask the author for permission

Name: GLOBAL:RoomType
Comment: It can be free field, reverberant, shoebox or dae.

Name: EmitterPosition
Comment: Each speaker is represented as an Emitter.

Name: Data.SamplingRate
Comment: Sampling rate of the samples in Data.IR and Data.Delay.

Name: Data.Delay
Comment: Additional delay of each IR (in samples, with the time interval as described by SamplingRate).
